column4: Brussel sprouts tempura and Jinya bun. All are pretty good
column5: but my favorite is the Jinya bun. As for ramen
column9: and the spicy chicken broth. The spicy miso is my least favorite as it was too salty for me. I also wasn't a fan of ground pork as the meat. The spicy chicken and the tonkatsu black comes with sliced meat
column10: which is more appealing to my palate.
